Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:<RF>Daniel: or, Chileab 2Sam.3.3.<Rf>
The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:
The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
<FI>These<Fi> six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.

And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel:<RF>Shimea: or, Shammua 2.Sam.5.14.<Rf><RF>Bathshua: or, Bathsheba 2Sam.11.13.<Rf><RF>Ammiel: or, Eliam 2.Sam.11.3.<Rf>
Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,<RF>Elishama: or, Elishua 2Sa.5.15.<Rf>
And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.<RF>Eliada: or, Beeliada IChro.14.7.<Rf>
<FI>These were<Fi> all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.<CM>
And Solomon's son <FI>was<Fi> Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,<RF>Abia: or, Abijam I.king.15.1.<Rf>
Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,<RF>Ahaziah: or, Azariah 2.Chr.22.6.& 21.17.<Rf>
Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,<RF>Azariah: or, Uzziah 2.king.15.30.<Rf>
Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
Amon his son, Josiah his son.

And the sons of Josiah <FI>were<Fi>, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.<RF>Johanan: or, Jehochaz 2.kin.23.30.<Rf><RF>Jehoiakim: or, Eliakim 2.kin.23.34.<Rf><RF>Zedekiah: or, Mathaniah.2.kin.24.17.<Rf>
And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.<RF>Jeconiah: also called, Jehoiachin 2kin.24.6, Zedekiah: or Coniah ier.22.24<Rf>
And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,<RF>Salathiel: Heb. Shealtiel<Rf>
Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
And the sons of Pedaiah <FI>were<Fi>, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:
And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, five.
And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.<RF>Hezekiah: Heb. Hiskijah<Rf>
And the sons of Elioenai <FI>were<Fi>, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.<CM>
